subject: OPPORTUNITY FROM EXXONMOBIL
body: $B?7$7$$%a!<%k%"%I%l%9$r$*CN$i$;$7$^$9(B$B?7$7$$%a!<%k%"%I%l%9!'(B w_rhowell400@yahoo.co.jpHello,I'm William R. Howell, a staff of ExxonMobil with a private brief from my colleagues in need of your partnership to re-profile an outstanding contract amount of US$12.2M in your name. You shall be compensated with 20% of the total contract sum. Please reply for further details.Regards,- WILLIAM R.HOWEL
